parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates the camera shaking effect, like when you are near an explosion

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''addCamShake''' [power, duration, frequency]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> power: [[Number]] - Strength of shake, practical range is 0 to 20 (how strong the camera movement will be).
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> duration: [[Number]] - Duration in seconds (how long the effect will last)
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> frequency: [[Number]] - Frequency of shake, practical range is 0 to 100 (how will be the rhythm).

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[addCamShake]] [10, 1, 25];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[enableCamShake]] [[true]];
[[addCamShake]] [5, 5, 25];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableCamShake]], [[setCamShakeDefParams]], [[setCamShakeParams]], [[resetCamShake]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
